subject: p15185305
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, the pre-existing mild interstitial fluid overload has decreased. Unchanged are the retrocardiac areas of atelectasis, the large perihilar right-sided opacity as well as the likely presence of bilateral small pleural effusions. The monitoring and support devices are constant. The known rib fractures are better appreciated on the CT examination from. No evidence of pneumothorax.
